title: KARUNANIDHI WHOSE WISH IS EELAM STARTED BIRTHDAY WITH BAD NEWS
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana DMK President and Chairman of the Tamil Eelam Supporters Organization (TESO) Muthuvel Karunanidhi whose 89th birthday wish was the bifurcation of Sri Lanka started his birthday with hearing all kinds of ominous news when Chennai Corporation and Police started pulling down hundreds of illegal flex boards and then banners…
